statements: UPDATE UserAccounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE UserAccounts SET password_hash = 'newpasswordhash' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE UserAccounts SET password_hash='new_password123' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE UserAccounts SET username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=202;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE authentication SET auth_token = 'new_auth_token' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', password_hash='newpasswordhash' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE authentication SET auth_token='newauthtoken' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_sessions SET end_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE session_id = 10;
UPDATE users SET email = 'updated_email@example.com', username = 'updated_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_sessions SET end_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, start_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE session_id = 100;
UPDATE users SET password_hash = 'newpassword' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE user_profiles SET bio = 'Updated bio', full_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = '2f81d2a3-26e3-452e-aa85-ae06a569606d';
UPDATE user_profiles SET bio = 'Updated bio information', birthdate = '1990-05-15' WHERE user_id = '2f81d2a3-26e3-452e-aa85-ae06a569606d';
UPDATE Users SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserRoles SET role_name = 'Admin' WHERE role_id = 2;
UPDATE Users SET username = 'alice123', password = 'newPassword123' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET last_name = 'Doe', bio = 'Updated bio' WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE username = 'alice123');
